thought: The website is accessible. I need to further analyze the content to determine if it is a scam website.
observation: First Credit Union: Local Banking, Investing, Borrowing & More  Skip to main content Become a Member , opens in a new tab Rates Calculators Contact Us Book an Appointment Search Clear Input Login Everyday Banking Online Banking Chequing Accounts Savings Accounts Credit Cards First App Community Accounts Senior Accounts Student Accounts Investing Investments Responsible Investing Online Investing Borrowing Personal Loans Lines of Credit Mortgages Business Business Accounts Business Loans Commercial Mortgage Business Lines of Credit Small Business Online Banking Wealth Management Financial Blueprint Planning and Advice Retirement Planning Estate Planning Education Planning Life and Health Insurance Our Difference Community Impact Co-operative Principles and Values Member Benefits Environmental Responsibility Governance and Leadership Our Story Vision and Purpose News and Events Financial Literacy Menu Where You Bank Makes a Difference! Get full-service banking and expert financial advice where 10% of profits are reinvested back into your local community. Login to Online Banking More Online Services Collabria Mastercard & Visa Credential Online Qtrade Direct Investing Bowen Closed Today Our Bowen Contact & Hours It’s easy, convenient and secure to book an appointment with us. Simply select the appointment you need, choose in-person or by phone, select a date and time, and answer a few quick questions to get started. Book Now Select Image First Credit Union News April 19, 2024 Notice of AGM: Join us for our 2024 Annual General Meeting. Register here! Board election & special resolution voting open April 8th - 19th. Cast your vote! February 13, 2024 First Credit Union named as one of BC's Top Employers for the third consecutive year See All News A Better Way to Bank Credit unions have a set of co-operative principles and values that guide our actions. Honesty, openness, social responsibility and caring of others are the ethical values that keep us focused on positively impacting our members, employees and communities. Key Benefits of Membership ✓ Local, friendly full-service banking with competitive rates Support positive change in your community, we reinvest 10% of profits locally Access to the largest network of surcharge-free ATMs in Canada Learn About Becoming a Member Making a Difference in Your Community We live in the communities we serve and we work to make them better. Learn more about what we're doing in your community and how where you bank makes a difference. Cultivating Kindness with Everybody Deserves a Smile Building lasting empathy and compassion requires ongoing dedication. The consistent effort has far-reaching effects, creating benefits for all involved. Building Trails for Strong Communities With support by the landowners and First, UROC is developing a bike skills park, which will include training drops and jumps for all skill levels Educate, Enhance and Empower: Powell River Salmon Society First is a proud supporter of the Powell River Salmon Society's community engagement and education Read Impact Stories First offers a full-suite of accounts and services to take care of your money in easy, cost-effective ways that work for you. Whether you want online banking or to connect with someone from our team, we're here. Get Started with Personal Banking You know where you want to be. Together we can help you get you there. Your First Credit Union membership gives you access to financial experts who will help you reach your goals. Get Started with Investing We're here to listen and help you get started with your unique plan or life-long dream. When you're a First Credit Union member, we'll build a customized lending solution together, one strategic decision at a time. Get Started with Borrowing Business Banking We're responsive and dedicated to your business's success. Our business specialists have autonomy and can make quick decisions. They'll provide personalized service, whatever your business banking needs or company size. Together we’ll create a personal financial blueprint designed to achieve your short-term and long-term goals. When life changes, your priorities can too. Our investment advice takes life’s highs and lows  into consideration. We’ll be there to help every step of the way. Get Started with Wealth Management Knowledge Center We're here to help. Get the educational resources and tools you need to increase your financial literacy. Helpful Resources Financial Calculators and Tools Fraud Prevention Explore Financial Literacy Tools First Credit Union operates on the traditional territories of the Coast Salish Peoples, specifically the K’òmoks, Klahoose, Tla’amin and Squamish Nations We are proud to be a certified B Corporation Quick links Login to more online services Blog Careers Insurance Online policy Terms, conditions & fees Follow us on social media Give us a call MemberSupport@FirstCU.ca Find a branch Our branches are located on Bowen Island, Bowser, Courtenay, Cumberland, Hornby Island, Powell River, Texada Island, and Union Bay. © 2023 First Credit Union
